title: No Guns Life
synopsis: The technology to create powerful cyborg soldiers has been released for public use by the Ber√ºhren Corporation. Those outfitted with robotic parts are known as the Extended. Juuzou Inui, one such Extended, was created as a soldier and has no memories of his former life. But now, after the war, he runs a business that takes care of Extended-related incidents around the city.
